items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely dress
items.body: Got an XS Fit perfectly, measurements are correct and has a nice stretch if needed. Read more
items.author: R.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant dress
items.body: Iâ€™m 5â€™0 around 123-125 pounds (unsure) and it did fit well kind of a little loose around the shoulders and waist (I ordered a size small.) the fabric weight wasnâ€™t heavy at all, it does snug your hip area to give you that hour glass shape. It really is elegant to wear and I enjoyed wearing it! It was stunning. You should definitely buy it. Not a complaint, but I think upper body area should be fixed a little more to make it slightly tighter. Not particularly blessed upstairs so it felt like there was a big gap in between me and the dress when I wouldnâ€™t down. But other than that it really is beautiful.. Read more
items.author: Yanira Lazo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Red Dress
items.body: Beautiful dress. Great color red (brighter in person) comfortable, good stretch, neck and chest area is super flattering and not too low cut. Great for your next Holiday party, wedding etc Read more
items.author: christine coelho

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really pretty but thin material
items.body: The style, color and fit of this dress is amazing. The material could definitely be better for the price. The fabric is very thin and delicate. It runs true to size. I am posting with and without flash to see the color. Overall I would recommend but be aware of how thin material is for the price. They have this dress on shein (way cheaper) as well but the shoulders are much more exposed and I liked the cut of this better. Read more
items.author: Mona Ramirez

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Used?

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Bodycon Ruched Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Bodycon Ruched Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Sparkling Black, Navy, White, Blue, Black, Sparkling Wine, Sparkling Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
